review: I heard about this years ago when they came out with it but never thought to buy it.  I had an extra TV in the house but no cable to hook up to the sattelite so I had attached this to the TV in the kitchen just to be able to play music or watch shows on and it works great.  I can play pandora or netflix right from my phone or tablet.  It was easy to set up.  I really like it because I just watch a show while I cook in the kitchen now.  Can play Pandora is you have friends over as well.  Also can broadcast Youtube or pictures on your phone or tablet.  Very neat little device.  I also plan to carry it with me when we go on vacation as you can just hook up to wifi and stream your shows or music on tv available in the room.
